model_answer: A: Because the interviewee audibly introduces himself as Dimitri, founder of Dbrain, a human-in-the-loop platform operating on blockchain for AI solutions, while the visuals show him wearing a DBRAIN shirt and an on-screen tag reading “Dmitry Matskevich, CEO of DBRAIN.”
